title: EastEnders' Bailey leaves viewers in tears with emotional question for Karen

Viewers gushed over the tender moment in tonight's EastEnders episode between Bailey Barker and Karen Taylor.

Bailey, played by Kara-Leah Fernandes, asked Karen, played by Lorraine Stanley, to adopt her.

Bailey's mum Dinah Wilson took her own life earlier this year in a tragic storyline that left Bailey devastated.

Since then, she has built up a relationship with her half brother Keegan, and with his mother, Karen.

Karen spotted that Bailey was hiding something in her school bag, and persuaded her to show what it was.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

Bailey reluctantly revealed it was a family tree she had made for a school project.

Overcome by emotion, Karen told her it was beautiful.

Bailey then told she had learnt about adoption.

"Would you like to become my mum number two officially?" she asked.

This scene tugged on viewers heartstrings, and they took to Twitter to share their reactions.

One said: "Bailey and Karen have just made me cry."

Another said: "Please can I be adopted by Karen?"

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

A third said: "What an emotional scene when Bailey asked Karen to be her Mum number two, bless her."

“'Would you like to become my mum No2?'.......Awwwww!! Bailey is TOO adorable!!!" said a fourth.

Karen is conflicted because she did not prevent Bailey's mother from taking her own life - and Bailey overhears her discussing this with Bailey's father.

When Karen approaches Bailey to accept her offer - furious Bailey tells her she heard what she said, and runs into her bedroom, slamming the door.
description: EastEnders viewers were overcome with emotion after a scene between Bailey Barker and Karen Taylor
